com.communote.server.api.core.image

Interface ImageTypeDescriptor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AttachmentImageDescriptor, ClientImageDescriptor, CustomizableImageTypeDescriptor, DefaultImageTypeDescriptor, EntityBannerImageDescriptor, EntityProfileImageDescriptor, UserImageDescriptor

    public interface ImageTypeDescriptor
    Describes an image type. This includes the supported sizes and some details how scaling should work (keep aspect-ratio, draw background, etc.).
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String extractImageIdentifier(Map<String,? extends Object> parameters)
      Get the identifier of an image from a key value mapping, like the parameters of a request.
      Color getBackgroundColor() 
      int getHorizontalAlignment() 
      String getName() 
      ImageSize getSizeForImageSizeType(ImageSizeType sizeType)
      Map an image size type to the actual size supported by this image type.
      List<ImageFormatType> getValidMimeTypes() 
      String getVersionString() 
      int getVerticalAlignment() 
      boolean isDrawBackground() 
      boolean isPreserveAspectRation() 

    • Method Detail

      • extractImageIdentifier

        String extractImageIdentifier(Map<String,? extends Object> parameters)
        Get the identifier of an image from a key value mapping, like the parameters of a request.
        Parameters:
        parameters - the parameters to parse
        Returns:
        the image identifier

      • getBackgroundColor

        Color getBackgroundColor()
        Returns:
        the background color to use to fill unoccupied pixels when scaling an image. Is only required when isDrawBackground() returns true.

      • getHorizontalAlignment

        int getHorizontalAlignment()
        Returns:
        a value describing the horizontal alignment of the image within the background when it is scaled. A value of less than 0 means to place the image at the top left, a value of 0 leads to centering the image and a value greater than 0 means to place the image at the right edge. Is only required when isDrawBackground() returns true.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns:
        the unique name of the image type

      • getSizeForImageSizeType

        ImageSize getSizeForImageSizeType(ImageSizeType sizeType)
        Map an image size type to the actual size supported by this image type.
        Parameters:
        sizeType - the size type to map
        Returns:
        the image size, must not be null

      • getValidMimeTypes

        List<ImageFormatType> getValidMimeTypes()
        Returns:
        the valid mime types

      • getVersionString

        String getVersionString()
        Returns:
        a string representing the version of the descriptor instance. The returned value should change each time the scaling properties are modified.

      • getVerticalAlignment

        int getVerticalAlignment()
        Returns:
        a value describing the vertical alignment of the image within the background when it is scaled. A value of less than 0 means to place the image at the top edge, a value of 0 leads to centering the image and a value greater than 0 means to place the image at the bottom edge. Is only required when isDrawBackground() returns true.

      • isDrawBackground

        boolean isDrawBackground()
        Returns:
        whether to fill the background of a scaled image with the color provided by getBackgroundColor()

      • isPreserveAspectRation

        boolean isPreserveAspectRation()
        Returns:
        whether to preserve the aspect ratio when scaling
